prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a small hound with fiery accents.
I want a quadrupedal creature that embodies the essence of fire and shadows.
Generate a Pokemon that has a sleek black coat with bright orange markings.
Make a canine-inspired Pokemon that thrives in urban settings and is fiercely loyal.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a playful yet fierce personality, perfect for battles.
Design a small yet agile Pokemon that can easily navigate forests and caves.
Show me a fierce companion Pokemon that has a striking contrast of colors.
